medical_history.chief_complaint: Progressive painful pruritic breast fullness, skin dimpling, and skin discoloration of the mastectomy scar and radiation field.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began in December 2013, approximately 9 years after receiving accelerated partial breast radiation, characterized by progressive painful pruritus and skin changes. Notable developments included ulcerating skin plaque, nipple retraction, and retroareolar aching, leading to medical care in January 2014.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Invasive mammillary carcinoma diagnosed in 2004, treated with partial mastectomy and radiation therapy. Medical history includes hypercholesterolemia and depression. Notable history of a chronic radiation bed seroma before 2014.
medical_history.family_history: Breast cancer in both mother and sister.
